projectGridLines.title: Software
projectGridLines.description: Siemens EDA provides a unique blend of an opportunity to work on latest technology and come up with innovation for software engineers who want to design software products for electronic design development. We are looking for students with the passion and capability for creating novel software solutions using C/C++ using a combination of analytical, software and digital skills.

projectGridLines.title: Webdeveloper
projectGridLines.description:
• Writing clean, efficient, and well-documented code using languages such as HTML, CSS, XML, and JavaScript
  • Good in any scripting language PERL/SHELL/PYTHON
  • Implementing and maintaining website content management systems
  • Troubleshooting and debugging issues to ensure websites are functioning correctly
  • Staying up-to-date with the latest web technologies and industry trends to ensure the website is current and secure
  • Creating and managing databases for website functionality
